name: Phantom Space
description:
While charting an unknown region of space, hostile fighters appear out of nowhere. As you face down hordes of ships, one of your scanning beacons tells a different story; most of the ships are merely projections! In order to survive you must seek out and destroy the real enemies! How long can you last in Phantom Space!

A Game By JeffCubeand SHHH for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1:

  • Programmer / Developer: JeffCube
  • Art + Audio: SHHH
